This British chiller-diller-thriller begins with the mysterious murder of a lighthouse keeper. posts._title: Pedro Almodóvar – Pepi, Luci, Bom y otras chicas del montón (1980)
posts.title: Pepi, Luci, Bom y otras chicas del montón
posts.excerpt: This is Almodóvar’s first feature film. The plot follows the wild adventures of three friends: Pepi, an independent modern woman; Luci, a mousy, masochistic housewife; and Bom, a lesbian punk rock singer. The central theme of the film – female resilience, independence and solidarity – would be a constant throughout Almodóvar’s career. (Wikipedia)

posts.title: Trois ponts sur la rivière
posts.excerpt: IMDB: The life of Arthur, a professor living in Paris, changes when Frank comes to live on the same floor of the building where he is residing.
